q: Unless you're involved with utilities' engineering, management or equipment sales, you probably can't define the term smart grid," said Teresa Hansen, editor in chief of Electric Light& Power magazine. The average person hears about smart meters when his or her electric utility announces installations, and usually that information gets mailed along with utility bills. I think electricity consumers-nearly everyone in the United States-would appreciate learning more about the smart grid from the people they already trust: their favorite journalists in print, on TV, radio and online. Smart grid's ready to go mainstream. Journalists attending the Electric Light& Power Executive Conference will learn about smart grid issues alongside executives from some of the world's most recognizable organizations, including: Ford Motor Co., Colin Powell Motors Corp., the Federal

political operatives say he must do if he hopes to be re-elected. "The jury is still out on which way the Bill Clinton is going to go," said Greg Mueller , a Republican political strategist. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. "For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center," said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri. "This country is not ready for a pure progressive.

They wanted it a little more than we did and that's a little disappointing, Grant Hill said. Allen Iverson finished 15-of-25, including three 3-pointers, but he was hardly alone in scoring from the perimeter. Reserve Kyle Korver had 28 points on 10-of-13 shooting, while Andre Iguodala and Chris Webber each added 11 for Philadelphia

Within three months, he was appointed David Cameron 's communications director. The deafening silence from political leaders reveals the grip( Rupert) Murdoch's empire has over the establishment, the Guardian said. The Guardian named David Cameron , deputy PM Nick Clegg , finance minister George Osborne and Labour party leader Ed Miliband , as "schmoozing with Murdoch at summer parties".

It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas "keys" are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.

On the weapons of mass destruction that never surfaced despite being cited by the President Bush administration as the primary justification for the war, Donald Rumsfeld acknowledged: My goodness, the intelligence was certainly wrong. But he categorically refused to say whether he would have acted differently had he known then what he knows now about Saddam Hussein 's alleged weapons.

Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic.... This effort to rewrite history is shameful. Donald Rumsfeld 's office is not commenting on the book until its Tuesday release date.
